screenshot.caption: K25 file open in XnViewMP

description: The Kodak DC25 is a digital camera that Kodak released in the late 1990s. Notably, the DC25 was the first Kodak digital camera that could save photos to a Compact Flash removable memory card. These photos, as well as photos saved to the camera's internal memory, were saved as K25 files.
